note.p: Death: His residence on Clapham Common, Surrey (13 October 1861)
Education: Career: Freemason, Initiated, 20 November 1837, passed 18 December 1837 and raised 15 January 1838, Grand Master's Lodge No 1, London
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1862-1863 vol 12 p iv
References: John R Levene, 'Sir George Biddell Airy, FRS (1801-1892) and the Discovery and Correction of Astigmatism' in NR 1966 vol 21 pp 180-199
The Library and Museumm of Freemasonry 'Freemasons and the Royal Society;Alphabetical List of Fellows of the Royal Society who were Freemasons' 2010, page 24-25
